topic.title: Outcomes Discharge Diagnosis Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11535-2" Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] templateId1 with @xsi:type="II"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Hospital Discharge Diagnosis"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Problem Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2008-12-18
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value1 with @xsi:type="CD"
NEMSIS Trace: eOutcome.13 - Hospital Diagnosis Note that the C-CDA template requires a SCT code, which can be null; NEMSIS specifies an ICD-10 CM value, which should be placed in a code translation
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11535-2" Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Hospital Discharge Diagnosis"
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] templateId1 with @xsi:type="II"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Problem Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2008-12-18
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value1 with @xsi:type="CD"
NEMSIS Trace: eOutcome.13 - Hospital Diagnosis Note that the C-CDA template requires a SCT code, which can be null; NEMSIS specifies an ICD-10 CM value, which should be placed in a code translation
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
